entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -0.6°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
